title: The Little Red Matchmaker
overview: Five hundred years ago, Hong Luan and Tian Xi, two deities, battled against the nine-tailed fox. To protect Hong Luan, Tian Xi decided to exhaust a thousand years of soul power to seal away the nine-tailed fox. After that, Hong Luan lost her memory and became Liu Yingying, a matchmaker working for Yue Lao, a god of marriage and love. Hong Luan won the heart of Jiang Changqing, a reincarnated immortal under the Heartless Curse. Meanwhile, the nine-tailed fox was on the verge of breaking through its seal. A story about three lives of love trials unfolds.
